books.author: by Mark R. Levin
books.description: The Fox News host gives his take on the Green New Deal, critical race theory and social activism.
books.name: AMERICAN MARXISM

books.author: by Chris Wallace with Mitch Weiss
books.description: The intelligence gathering, security strategizing and military planning during the final eight months of the pursuit of Osama bin Laden.
books.name: COUNTDOWN BIN LADEN

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Qian Julie Wang
books.description: A 7-year-old girl and her parents encounter difficulties in New York City when they leave China in the 1990s.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL COUNTRY

books.author: by Bobby Hall
books.description: The hip-hop recording artist known as Logic tells his life story.
books.name: THIS BRIGHT FUTURE

books.author: by Roxane van Iperen
books.description: Janny and Lien Brilleslijper from Amsterdam were sent by train to Auschwitz when the Jewish safehouse they created in the woods was discovered.
books.name: THE SISTERS OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Hayley Mills
books.description: The Disney child star of the 1960s and daughter of an acclaimed British actor shares some of her experiences in Hollywood.
books.name: FOREVER YOUNG

books.author: by Craig Whitlock
books.description: An investigative reporter for The Washington Post gives an account of how three successive presidents and their military commanders handled America’s invasion of Afghanistan after 9/11.
books.name: THE AFGHANISTAN PAPERS

books.author: by Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
books.description: An approach to dealing with trauma that shifts an essential question used to investigate it.
books.name: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU?

books.author: by Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years.
books.name: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: by Tucker Carlson
books.description: A collection of previously published essays from 1995 to 2016 by the Fox News host.
books.name: THE LONG SLIDE

books.author: by David M. Rubenstein
books.description: Conversations that explore what America is and what it could be with leaders in various fields.
books.name: THE AMERICAN EXPERIMENT

books.author: by Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show.”
books.name: BORN A CRIME

books.author: by Robin Wall Kimmerer
books.description: A botanist and member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation espouses having an understanding and appreciation of plants and animals.
books.name: BRAIDING SWEETGRASS

books.author: by Joseph Pfeifer
books.description: A memoir by the first F.D.N.Y. chief to respond to the 9/11 attacks at the World Trade Center.
books.name: ORDINARY HEROES
